skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: creative director
Developer Terms of Use
des: I made Creative Director to give freelancers/students a CD to bounce their ideas off of. He's a little hard to please, but if you try saying something like "Hire Ricky Lambert" he might come around...
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
